title: Wrong ban
body:
Hey Riot,

You just banned my friend that hasn't actually been online in about a year and doesn't have the game installed on his computer. Glad you don't listen to cases on bans though, because you never make mistakes!

Top notch work as per usual!

replies.body:
Did he give his account to someone? 
Was his account maybe compromised? 
What was the given reason for the ban? 
Did he submit a ticket to support or are you only referring to boards when you say Riot doesn't listen to cases on bans?
How do you know a mistake was made?
What is your friend's summoner name?

You've given us absolutely no information which might allow us to help and support you. We're happy to help you as far as we can here on boards but you have to give us a bit more than "friend was banned great job".
Same with me...all I got was an aggressive "Support" representative
I responded to your thread about your ban in help and support, we can discuss it there.
